name: Alex
introduction:
my name is Alex, and I'd like to share my passion for adventure through video games.
I enjoy interacting with my friends and finding new adventures. I also like the free and open Internet. My friends love to read my silly stories and I enjoy spending time with my family and nature reserves.
My video games are Destiny, Super Smash Bros., Call of Duty, World of Warcraft, Diablo, StarCraft and League of Legends.
Do you have what it takes to become the next Ashkenazim? Let me know!
The Mary Sue has a strict comment policy that starts with the most ridiculous the worst. I will not hold my own posters shall receive death threats and a permanent ban from my personal page
Do you have what it takes to become the next Ashkenazim? Let me know!
